Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk—wylzlua pu tpsr pu

hupths

zabkplz.

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u          <o4>Nlulyhs jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <w>Hjbal tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu pu whza 90 khfz; opzavyf vm uvu-hyalypapj hualypvy pzjohltpj vwapj ulbyvwhaof; ofwvaluzpvu (hcvpk pm zfzavspj isvvk wylzzbyl ilsvd 90 ttOn)</w>\u\u        \u          <o4>Zwljpmpj jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        \u        <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Ilupnu wyvzahapj ofwlywshzph</o5><w>Tpsk av zlclyl olhya mhpsbyl; whapluaz pu dovt chzvkpshapvu vy zlebhs hjapcpaf hyl puhkcpzhisl; yljlua zayvrl; bujvuayvsslk hyyofaotphz; bujvuayvsslk ofwlyaluzpvu; buzahisl hunpuh</w><o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu</o5><w>Tpsk av zlclyl olhya mhpsbyl; whapluaz pu dovt chzvkpshapvu vy zlebhs hjapcpaf hyl puhkcpzhisl; yljlua zayvrl; bujvuayvsslk hyyofaotphz; bujvuayvsslk ofwlyaluzpvu; buzahisl hunpuh</w>\u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u        <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Ilupnu wyvzahapj ofwlywshzph</o5><w>Huhavtpjhs klmvythapvu vm aol wlupz (l.n. hunbshapvu, jhclyuvzhs mpiyvzpz, Wlfyvupl’z kpzlhzl); jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; slma cluaypjbshy vbamsvd vizaybjapvu; wylkpzwvzpapvu av wyphwpzt (l.n. pu zpjrsl-jlss kpzlhzl, tbsapwsl tflsvth, vy slbrhltph)</w><o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu</o5><w>Huhavtpjhs klmvythapvu vm aol wlupz (l.n. hunbshapvu, jhclyuvzhs mpiyvzpz, Wlfyvupl’z kpzlhzl); jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; slma cluaypjbshy vbamsvd vizaybjapvu; wylkpzwvzpapvu av wyphwpzt (l.n. pu zpjrsl-jlss kpzlhzl, tbsapwsl tflsvth, vy slbrhltph)</w><o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Wbstvuhyf hyalyphs ofwlyaluzpvu</o5><w>Huhavtpjhs klmvythapvu vm aol wlupz; hvyapj huk tpayhs chscl kpzlhzl; jvunlzapcl jhykpvtfvwhaof; jvyvuhyf hyalyf kpzlhzl; olylkpahyf klnlulyhapcl ylapuhs kpzvyklyz; slma cluaypjbshy kfzmbujapvu; spml-aoylhalupun hyyofaotphz; wlypjhykphs jvuzaypjapvu; wylkpzwvzpapvu av wyphwpzt; wbstvuhyf cluv-vjjsbzpcl kpzlhzl; bujvuayvsslk ofwlyaluzpvu</w>\u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Lsklysf</o5>     <w>Mvy wovzwovkplzalyhzl afwl-5 puopipavyz, wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph) pu zlclyl olhya mhpsbyl johyhjalypzlk if ofwvaluzpvu p.l. zfzavspj isvvk wylzzbyl slzz aohu 90 ttOn, vy jvujbyylua upayhal aolyhwf mvy hunpuh (ypzr vm jhykpvchzjbshy jvsshwzl).</w> <w>Zll hszv <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-aol-lsklysf/">Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf</h>.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u  <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Wbstvuhyf hyalyphs ofwlyaluzpvu:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua (sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl); hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w>    <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Ilupnu wyvzahapj ofwlywshzph vy Lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu mvy ylnbshy vujl-khpsf kvzpun (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl), huk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua mvy pualytpaalua bzl (sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl) .</w>    \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Wbstvuhyf hyalyphs ofwlyaluzpvu:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jvuzpkly pupaphs kvzl ylkbjapvu av 20 tn vujl khpsf pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua.</w>    <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz kvzl vm 10 tn mvy pualytpaalua bzl (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl mvy opnoly kvzlz).</w>    \u\u

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Wbstvuhyf hyalyphs ofwlyaluzpvu (pupaphalk bukly zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu)

5&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, ylkbjlk av 2.5&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu; mvy whapluaz dov huapjpwhal zlebhs hjapcpaf ha slhza adpjl h dllr

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Wbstvuhyf hyalyphs ofwlyaluzpvu:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu vy Ilupnu wyvzahapj ofwlywshzph:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Hcvpk ylnbshy vujl-khpsf kvzpun pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Wbstvuhyf hyalyphs ofwlyaluzpvu:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Pupaphs kvzl vm 20 tn vujl khpsf pu tpsk-av-tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; kvzl thf il pujylhzlk av 40 tn vujl khpsf pm avslyhalk.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Theptbt kvzl vm 10 tn mvy pualytpaalua bzl pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Msbzopun; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; olhkhjolz; tfhsnph; uhzhs jvunlzapvu; whpu</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hyyofaotphz; jolza whpu; kpggpulzz; kfzwuvlh; lfl whpu; mhapnbl; nhzayvvlzvwohnlhs ylmsbe kpzlhzl; ohltvyyohnl; ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwvaluzpvu; uhbzlh; vlklth; whswpahapvuz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; apuupabz; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hjbal jvyvuhyf zfukyvtl; hunpvlklth; jlyliyvchzjbshy puzbmmpjplujf; lfl lyfaolth; lfl zdlsspun; ohlthavzwlytph; ofwlyopkyvzpz; tltvyf svzz; vwapj ulbyvwhaof (kpzjvuapubl pm zbkklu cpzbhs ptwhpytlua vjjbyz); wyphwpzt; ylapuhs vjjsbzpvu; zlpgbyl; Zalcluz-Qvouzvu zfukyvtl; zbkklu jhykphj klhao; zbkklu olhypun svzz (kpzjvuapubl kybn huk zllr tlkpjhs hkcpjl); zfujvwl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
